title: Hi Ping issues
body:
Hi there Riot ... me my bro ,my sister and my room mate are from south Africa , been playing for years and we've unfortunately only had around  a stable 200 ping but was still able to play pretty well until just over a well a week ago .. the ping moved up to around 250-260 ping  constantly staying there ...we had a 4 mb/s line and upgraded to a 8mb/s line from MWEB and there is no difference  [what so ever ] other than that i can download your updates 2 x faster  lol .. Could you please advise me on behalf of my whole lol loving household as to why we are geting such unplayable ping when all my other games im getting normal ping like in cs go ,entropia , battlefield .... im realy stumped ...

would appreciate it alot  .
thanks 
King Jarred

replies.body:
Your latency (ping) to a server is mostly determined by your network routing to that server. We can certainly take a look at your route, but first, we need to confirm that your local network settings are compatible with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you continue to see high latency after checking out that guide.
